data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Electromagnetic radiation is a form of energy that includes radio waves, microwaves, gamma rays, and visible light. This ____ of ____ comes ____ atoms, ____ are ____ building ____ of ____ things. Atoms ____ particles ____ contain ____ electric ____. The ____ of ____ charged ____ produces ____ that ____ in ____. These waves of energy can travel through outer space, air, and solid materials.

The mot___ of th___ charged part_____ produces ene___ that tra____ in wa___. These waves of energy can travel through outer space, air, and solid materials.
data.answer: 电磁辐射是一种能量形式，包括无线电波、微波、伽马射线和可见光。这种辐射来自原子，而原子是构成万物的基石。原子含有含有电荷的粒子。这些带电粒子的运动产生的能量以波的形式传播。这些能量波可以在外太空、空气和固体物质中传播。
